00022 class QwtThermo::PrivateData
00023 {
00024 public:
00025     PrivateData():
00026         fillBrush(Qt::black),
00027         alarmBrush(Qt::white),
00028         orientation(Qt::Vertical),
00029         scalePos(QwtThermo::Left),
00030         borderWidth(2),
00031         scaleDist(3),
00032         thermoWidth(10),
00033         minValue(0.0),
00034         maxValue(1.0),
00035         value(0.0),
00036         alarmLevel(0.0),
00037         alarmEnabled(false)
00038     {
00039         map.setScaleInterval(minValue, maxValue);
00040     }
00041 
00042     QwtScaleMap map;
00043     QRect thermoRect;
00044     QBrush fillBrush;
00045     QBrush alarmBrush;
00046 
00047     Qt::Orientation orientation;
00048     ScalePos scalePos;
00049     int borderWidth;
00050     int scaleDist;
00051     int thermoWidth;
00052 
00053     double minValue;
00054     double maxValue;
00055     double value;
00056     double alarmLevel;
00057     bool alarmEnabled;
00058 };

00083 void QwtThermo::initThermo()
00084 {
00085 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00086     setWFlags(Qt::WNoAutoErase);
00087 #endif
00088     d_data = new PrivateData;
00089     setRange(d_data->minValue, d_data->maxValue, false);
00090 
00091     QSizePolicy policy(QSizePolicy::MinimumExpanding, QSizePolicy::Fixed);
00092     if (d_data->orientation == Qt::Vertical) 
00093         policy.transpose();
00094 
00095     setSizePolicy(policy);
00096     
00097 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00098     setAttribute(Qt::WA_WState_OwnSizePolicy, false);
00099 #else
00100     clearWState( WState_OwnSizePolicy );
00101 #endif
00102 }

00108 }

00166 void QwtThermo::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *e)
00167 {
00168     // Use double-buffering
00169     const QRect &ur = e->rect();
00170     if ( ur.isValid() )
00171     {
00172 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00173         QwtPaintBuffer paintBuffer(this, ur);
00174         draw(paintBuffer.painter(), ur);
00175 #else
00176         QPainter painter(this);
00177         draw(&painter, ur);
00178 #endif
00179     }
00180 }
00181 
00183 void QwtThermo::draw(QPainter *p, const QRect& ur)
00184 {
00185     if ( !d_data->thermoRect.contains(ur) )
00186     {
00187         if (d_data->scalePos != None)
00188         {
00189 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00190             scaleDraw()->draw(p, colorGroup());
00191 #else
00192             scaleDraw()->draw(p, palette());
00193 #endif
00194         }
00195 
00196         qDrawShadePanel(p,
00197             d_data->thermoRect.x() - d_data->borderWidth,
00198             d_data->thermoRect.y() - d_data->borderWidth,
00199             d_data->thermoRect.width() + 2*d_data->borderWidth,
00200             d_data->thermoRect.height() + 2*d_data->borderWidth,
00201 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00202             colorGroup(), 
00203 #else
00204             palette(), 
00205 #endif
00206             true, d_data->borderWidth,0);
00207     }
00208     drawThermo(p);
00209 }

00212 void QwtThermo::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *)
00213 {
00214     layoutThermo( false );

00216 
00223 void QwtThermo::layoutThermo( bool update_geometry )
00224 {
00225     QRect r = rect();
00226     int mbd = 0;
00227     if ( d_data->scalePos != None )
00228     {
00229         int d1, d2;
00230         scaleDraw()->getBorderDistHint(font(), d1, d2);
00231         mbd = qwtMax(d1, d2);
00232     }
00233 
00234     if ( d_data->orientation == Qt::Horizontal )
00235     {
00236         switch ( d_data->scalePos )
00237         {
00238             case Top:
00239             {
00240                 d_data->thermoRect.setRect(
00241                     r.x() + mbd + d_data->borderWidth,
00242                     r.y() + r.height()
00243                     - d_data->thermoWidth - 2*d_data->borderWidth,
00244                     r.width() - 2*(d_data->borderWidth + mbd),
00245                     d_data->thermoWidth);
00246                 scaleDraw()->setAlignment(QwtScaleDraw::TopScale);
00247                 scaleDraw()->move( d_data->thermoRect.x(),
00248                     d_data->thermoRect.y() - d_data->borderWidth 
00249                         - d_data->scaleDist);
00250                 scaleDraw()->setLength(d_data->thermoRect.width());
00251                 break;
00252             }
00253 
00254             case Bottom:
00255             case None: // like Bottom but without scale
00256             default:   // inconsistent orientation and scale position
00257                        // Mapping between values and pixels requires
00258                        // initialization of the scale geometry
00259             {
00260                 d_data->thermoRect.setRect(
00261                     r.x() + mbd + d_data->borderWidth,
00262                     r.y() + d_data->borderWidth,
00263                     r.width() - 2*(d_data->borderWidth + mbd),
00264                     d_data->thermoWidth);
00265                 scaleDraw()->setAlignment(QwtScaleDraw::BottomScale);
00266                 scaleDraw()->move(
00267                     d_data->thermoRect.x(),
00268                     d_data->thermoRect.y() + d_data->thermoRect.height()
00269                         + d_data->borderWidth + d_data->scaleDist );
00270                 scaleDraw()->setLength(d_data->thermoRect.width());
00271                 break;
00272             }
00273         }
00274         d_data->map.setPaintInterval(d_data->thermoRect.x(),
00275             d_data->thermoRect.x() + d_data->thermoRect.width() - 1);
00276     }
00277     else // Qt::Vertical
00278     {
00279         switch ( d_data->scalePos )
00280         {
00281             case Right:
00282             {
00283                 d_data->thermoRect.setRect(
00284                     r.x() + d_data->borderWidth,
00285                     r.y() + mbd + d_data->borderWidth,
00286                     d_data->thermoWidth,
00287                     r.height() - 2*(d_data->borderWidth + mbd));
00288                 scaleDraw()->setAlignment(QwtScaleDraw::RightScale);
00289                 scaleDraw()->move(
00290                     d_data->thermoRect.x() + d_data->thermoRect.width()
00291                         + d_data->borderWidth + d_data->scaleDist,
00292                     d_data->thermoRect.y());
00293                 scaleDraw()->setLength(d_data->thermoRect.height());
00294                 break;
00295             }
00296 
00297             case Left:
00298             case None: // like Left but without scale
00299             default:   // inconsistent orientation and scale position
00300                        // Mapping between values and pixels requires
00301                        // initialization of the scale geometry
00302             {
00303                 d_data->thermoRect.setRect(
00304                     r.x() + r.width() - 2*d_data->borderWidth - d_data->thermoWidth,
00305                     r.y() + mbd + d_data->borderWidth,
00306                     d_data->thermoWidth,
00307                     r.height() - 2*(d_data->borderWidth + mbd));
00308                 scaleDraw()->setAlignment(QwtScaleDraw::LeftScale);
00309                 scaleDraw()->move(
00310                     d_data->thermoRect.x() - d_data->scaleDist 
00311                         - d_data->borderWidth,
00312                     d_data->thermoRect.y() );
00313                 scaleDraw()->setLength(d_data->thermoRect.height());
00314                 break;
00315             }
00316         }
00317         d_data->map.setPaintInterval(
00318             d_data->thermoRect.y() + d_data->thermoRect.height() - 1,
00319             d_data->thermoRect.y());
00320     }
00321     if ( update_geometry )
00322     {
00323         updateGeometry();
00324         update();
00325     }
00326 }
00327 
00344 void QwtThermo::setOrientation(Qt::Orientation o, ScalePos s)
00345 {
00346     if ( o == d_data->orientation && s == d_data->scalePos )
00347         return;
00348 
00349     switch(o)
00350     {
00351         case Qt::Horizontal:
00352         {
00353             if ((s == None) || (s == Bottom) || (s == Top))
00354                 d_data->scalePos = s;
00355             else
00356                 d_data->scalePos = None;
00357             break;
00358         }
00359         case Qt::Vertical:
00360         {
00361             if ((s == None) || (s == Left) || (s == Right))
00362                 d_data->scalePos = s;
00363             else
00364                 d_data->scalePos = None;
00365             break;
00366         }
00367     }
00368 
00369     if ( o != d_data->orientation )
00370     {
00371 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00372         if ( !testAttribute(Qt::WA_WState_OwnSizePolicy) )
00373 #else
00374         if ( !testWState( WState_OwnSizePolicy ) )
00375 #endif
00376         {
00377             QSizePolicy sp = sizePolicy();
00378             sp.transpose();
00379             setSizePolicy(sp);
00380 
00381 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00382             setAttribute(Qt::WA_WState_OwnSizePolicy, false);
00383 #else
00384             clearWState( WState_OwnSizePolicy );
00385 #endif
00386         }
00387     }
00388 
00389     d_data->orientation = o;
00390     layoutThermo();
00391 }
00392 
00407 void QwtThermo::setScalePosition(ScalePos s)
00408 {
00409     if ((s == Bottom) || (s == Top))
00410         setOrientation(Qt::Horizontal, s);
00411     else if ((s == Left) || (s == Right))
00412         setOrientation(Qt::Vertical, s);
00413     else
00414         setOrientation(d_data->orientation, None);
00415 }
00416 
00418 QwtThermo::ScalePos QwtThermo::scalePosition() const
00419 {
00420     return d_data->scalePos;
00421 }

00425 {
00426     QWidget::fontChange( f );
00427     layoutThermo();

00431 void QwtThermo::scaleChange()
00432 {
00433     update();
00434     layoutThermo();
00435 }
00436 
00438 void QwtThermo::drawThermo(QPainter *p)
00439 {
00440     int alarm  = 0, taval = 0;
00441 
00442     QRect fRect;
00443     QRect aRect;
00444     QRect bRect;
00445 
00446     int inverted = ( d_data->maxValue < d_data->minValue );
00447 
00448     //
00449     //  Determine if value exceeds alarm threshold.
00450     //  Note: The alarm value is allowed to lie
00451     //        outside the interval (minValue, maxValue).
00452     //
00453     if (d_data->alarmEnabled)
00454     {
00455         if (inverted)
00456         {
00457             alarm = ((d_data->alarmLevel >= d_data->maxValue)
00458                  && (d_data->alarmLevel <= d_data->minValue)
00459                  && (d_data->value >= d_data->alarmLevel));
00460         
00461         }
00462         else
00463         {
00464             alarm = (( d_data->alarmLevel >= d_data->minValue)
00465                  && (d_data->alarmLevel <= d_data->maxValue)
00466                  && (d_data->value >= d_data->alarmLevel));
00467         }
00468     }
00469 
00470     //
00471     //  transform values
00472     //
00473     int tval = transform(d_data->value);
00474 
00475     if (alarm)
00476        taval = transform(d_data->alarmLevel);
00477 
00478     //
00479     //  calculate recangles
00480     //
00481     if ( d_data->orientation == Qt::Horizontal )
00482     {
00483         if (inverted)
00484         {
00485             bRect.setRect(d_data->thermoRect.x(), d_data->thermoRect.y(),
00486                   tval - d_data->thermoRect.x(),
00487                   d_data->thermoRect.height());
00488         
00489             if (alarm)
00490             {
00491                 aRect.setRect(tval, d_data->thermoRect.y(),
00492                       taval - tval + 1,
00493                       d_data->thermoRect.height());
00494                 fRect.setRect(taval + 1, d_data->thermoRect.y(),
00495                       d_data->thermoRect.x() + d_data->thermoRect.width() - (taval + 1),
00496                       d_data->thermoRect.height());
00497             }
00498             else
00499             {
00500                 fRect.setRect(tval, d_data->thermoRect.y(),
00501                       d_data->thermoRect.x() + d_data->thermoRect.width() - tval,
00502                       d_data->thermoRect.height());
00503             }
00504         }
00505         else
00506         {
00507             bRect.setRect(tval + 1, d_data->thermoRect.y(),
00508                   d_data->thermoRect.width() - (tval + 1 - d_data->thermoRect.x()),
00509                   d_data->thermoRect.height());
00510         
00511             if (alarm)
00512             {
00513                 aRect.setRect(taval, d_data->thermoRect.y(),
00514                       tval - taval + 1,
00515                       d_data->thermoRect.height());
00516                 fRect.setRect(d_data->thermoRect.x(), d_data->thermoRect.y(),
00517                       taval - d_data->thermoRect.x(),
00518                       d_data->thermoRect.height());
00519             }
00520             else
00521             {
00522                 fRect.setRect(d_data->thermoRect.x(), d_data->thermoRect.y(),
00523                       tval - d_data->thermoRect.x() + 1,
00524                       d_data->thermoRect.height());
00525             }
00526         
00527         }
00528     }
00529     else // Qt::Vertical
00530     {
00531         if (tval < d_data->thermoRect.y())
00532             tval = d_data->thermoRect.y();
00533         else 
00534         {
00535             if (tval > d_data->thermoRect.y() + d_data->thermoRect.height())
00536                 tval = d_data->thermoRect.y() + d_data->thermoRect.height();
00537         }
00538 
00539         if (inverted)
00540         {
00541             bRect.setRect(d_data->thermoRect.x(), tval + 1,
00542             d_data->thermoRect.width(),
00543             d_data->thermoRect.height() - (tval + 1 - d_data->thermoRect.y()));
00544 
00545             if (alarm)
00546             {
00547                 aRect.setRect(d_data->thermoRect.x(), taval,
00548                     d_data->thermoRect.width(),
00549                     tval - taval + 1);
00550                 fRect.setRect(d_data->thermoRect.x(), d_data->thermoRect.y(),
00551                     d_data->thermoRect.width(),
00552                 taval - d_data->thermoRect.y());
00553             }
00554             else
00555             {
00556                 fRect.setRect(d_data->thermoRect.x(), d_data->thermoRect.y(),
00557                     d_data->thermoRect.width(),
00558                     tval - d_data->thermoRect.y() + 1);
00559             }
00560         }
00561         else
00562         {
00563             bRect.setRect(d_data->thermoRect.x(), d_data->thermoRect.y(),
00564             d_data->thermoRect.width(),
00565             tval - d_data->thermoRect.y());
00566             if (alarm)
00567             {
00568                 aRect.setRect(d_data->thermoRect.x(),tval,
00569                     d_data->thermoRect.width(),
00570                     taval - tval + 1);
00571                 fRect.setRect(d_data->thermoRect.x(),taval + 1,
00572                     d_data->thermoRect.width(),
00573                     d_data->thermoRect.y() + d_data->thermoRect.height() - (taval + 1));
00574             }
00575             else
00576             {
00577                 fRect.setRect(d_data->thermoRect.x(),tval,
00578                     d_data->thermoRect.width(),
00579                 d_data->thermoRect.y() + d_data->thermoRect.height() - tval);
00580             }
00581         }
00582     }
00583 
00584     //
00585     // paint thermometer
00586     //
00587     const QColor bgColor =
00588 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00589         colorGroup().color(QColorGroup::Background);
00590 #else
00591         palette().color(QPalette::Background);
00592 #endif
00593     p->fillRect(bRect, bgColor);
00594 
00595     if (alarm)
00596        p->fillRect(aRect, d_data->alarmBrush);
00597 
00598     p->fillRect(fRect, d_data->fillBrush);
00599 }

00602 void QwtThermo::setBorderWidth(int w)
00603 {
00604     if ((w >= 0) && (w < (qwtMin(d_data->thermoRect.width(), 
00605         d_data->thermoRect.height()) + d_data->borderWidth) / 2  - 1))
00606     {
00607         d_data->borderWidth = w;
00608         layoutThermo();
00609     }
00610 }

00613 int QwtThermo::borderWidth() const
00614 {
00615     return d_data->borderWidth;
00616 }
00617 
00624 void QwtThermo::setRange(double vmin, double vmax, bool logarithmic)
00625 {
00626     d_data->minValue = vmin;
00627     d_data->maxValue = vmax;
00628 
00629     if ( logarithmic )
00630         setScaleEngine(new QwtLog10ScaleEngine);
00631     else
00632         setScaleEngine(new QwtLinearScaleEngine);
00633 
00634     /*
00635       There are two different maps, one for the scale, the other
00636       for the values. This is confusing and will be changed
00637       in the future. TODO ...
00638      */
00639 
00640     d_data->map.setTransformation(scaleEngine()->transformation());
00641     d_data->map.setScaleInterval(d_data->minValue, d_data->maxValue);
00642 
00643     if (autoScale())
00644         rescale(d_data->minValue, d_data->maxValue);
00645 
00646     layoutThermo();
00647 }

00783 QSize QwtThermo::sizeHint() const
00784 {
00785     return minimumSizeHint();
00786 }
00787 
00793 QSize QwtThermo::minimumSizeHint() const
00794 {
00795     int w = 0, h = 0;
00796 
00797     if ( d_data->scalePos != None )
00798     {
00799         const int sdExtent = scaleDraw()->extent( QPen(), font() );
00800         const int sdLength = scaleDraw()->minLength( QPen(), font() );
00801 
00802         w = sdLength;
00803         h = d_data->thermoWidth + sdExtent + 
00804             d_data->borderWidth + d_data->scaleDist;
00805 
00806     }
00807     else // no scale
00808     {
00809         w = 200;
00810         h = d_data->thermoWidth;
00811     }
00812 
00813     if ( d_data->orientation == Qt::Vertical )
00814         qSwap(w, h);
00815 
00816     w += 2 * d_data->borderWidth;
00817     h += 2 * d_data->borderWidth;
00818 
00819     return QSize( w, h );
00820 }
00821 
00822 int QwtThermo::transform(double value) const
00823 {
00824     const double min = qwtMin(d_data->map.s1(), d_data->map.s2());
00825     const double max = qwtMax(d_data->map.s1(), d_data->map.s2());
00826 
00827     if ( value > max )
00828         value = max;
00829     if ( value < min )
00830         value = min;
00831 
00832     return d_data->map.transform(value);
00833 }
